title: 27 Nakshatras - Lunar Mansions
description: The 27 divisions of the zodiac, each ruled by a deity and planet

nakshatras.name: Ashwini
nakshatras.qualities: Swift action, healing ability, pioneering spirit, new beginnings
nakshatras.characteristics: Quick to act, energetic, natural healers, love adventure

nakshatras.name: Bharani
nakshatras.characteristics: Strong will, creative, can handle extremes, transformative

nakshatras.name: Krittika
nakshatras.qualities: Purification, sharp intellect, cutting through illusion
nakshatras.characteristics: Sharp mind, purifying nature, direct communication, leadership

nakshatras.name: Rohini
nakshatras.characteristics: Attractive, creative, love beauty and comfort, sensual

nakshatras.name: Mrigashira
nakshatras.characteristics: Seekers of knowledge, gentle yet strong, love travel

nakshatras.name: Ardra
nakshatras.qualities: Transformation through storms, deep emotion, renewal
nakshatras.characteristics: Intense emotions, transformative, can weather any storm

nakshatras.name: Punarvasu
nakshatras.qualities: Return to light, renewal, abundance, protection
nakshatras.characteristics: Optimistic, philosophical, ability to bounce back, nurturing

nakshatras.name: Pushya
nakshatras.characteristics: Nurturing, spiritual, disciplined, brings good fortune

nakshatras.name: Ashlesha
nakshatras.qualities: Mystical wisdom, kundalini energy, penetrating insight
nakshatras.characteristics: Intuitive, mystical, hypnotic, can see hidden truths

nakshatras.name: Magha
nakshatras.qualities: Royal authority, ancestral legacy, respect for tradition
nakshatras.characteristics: Regal bearing, respect tradition, connection to ancestors

applications: Determining personality traits and life patterns
Muhurta (electional astrology) for choosing auspicious times
Understanding karmic patterns from past lives
